Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

Patients who express feelings of fear or anxiety should be allowed to verbalize these feelings. Open-ended questions, asked by the nurse, will encourage the patient to talk openly and provide the nurse with an opportunity to further support and instruct the patient.

[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: PSYCOSOCIAL INTEGRITY 13
